name: John Clone Van Damn
description:
John Clone Van Damn is a turn based fighting game where your opponent will clone your actions and repeat them back at you. Originally a take on applying the ghost mechanic from racing games to a fighting game system. This changed towards a turn based game that has the puzzle element of remembering your inputted moves and countering them. Your moves are limited and you must refresh to have more actions, each refresh will activate the clone who will remember and repeat the moves you've inputted through each refresh.

You can only make so many moves before you must refresh

Once you refresh the clone will repeat your moves back at you 

With each refresh your available actions will increase by 1

The clones moves will stack with each refresh so remember your moves to outwit the clone.
